impact-statement: Nup98-HoxA9 is recruited to <italic>Hox</italic> gene cluster regions together with the chromosomally pre-bound nuclear export factor Crm1, which induces aberrant expression of several <italic>Hox</italic> genes and affecting the differentiation of embryonic stem cells.
